education.title: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
education.description: Currently in the third year of the program at 'Universidad Siglo 21', focusing on algorithms, data structures, OOP with Java, concurrency, parallelism, software architecture, databases (SQL), and software engineering. Additionally, I am developing skills in leadership, teamwork, and organizational management.

education.title: Electrician Technician
education.description: During my studies at 'Instituto Mariano Fragueiro', I acquired skills in the design, installation, and maintenance of electrical systems, along with proficiency in AutoCAD and SketchUp for 2D and 3D design and blueprint reading. I actively participated in practical projects that reinforced my technical understanding.

workExperience.title: Customer Service
workExperience.description: Family business with over 2 years of experience in customer service, where I acquired key skills such as effective communication, conflict resolution, teamwork, and leadership. I implemented strategies to improve customer satisfaction and optimize service processes.

workExperience.title: Instrumentation Technician during the shutdown of Embalse Nuclear Power Plant 2024
workExperience.description: Specialized Officer in Instrumentation and Control during the shutdown of Embalse Nuclear Power Plant, where I performed preventive maintenance and calibration of high-precision equipment, such as valves and sensors, in a critical safety environment. Applied problem-solving techniques and ensured compliance with strict safety protocols.

workExperience.title: Instrumentation Technician during the shutdown of Embalse Nuclear Power Plant 2022
workExperience.description: Specialized Officer in Instrumentation and Control with a temporary contract during the shutdown of Embalse Nuclear Power Plant. I participated in the calibration and maintenance of critical systems, working closely with safety teams to ensure the proper functioning of instruments.

workExperience.title: Internship in Instrumentation and Control
workExperience.description: During this internship, I gained experience in the calibration and measurement of instruments, sensors, and valves, as well as in leak verification in controlled areas. This experience provided me with valuable insight into industrial processes in a regulated environment.

professionalCourses.title: Oracle Next Education F2 T5 Back-end Program
professionalCourses.description: This back-end course offered an intensive training experience spanning over 330 hours of specialized content. Throughout this course, I consolidated my knowledge in key back-end development technologies, including Java, SQL 'MySQL', Spring, and Oracle Cloud, as well as agile methodologies and programming best practices.

professionalCourses.title: Python, Data Science on OCI and Oracle Analytics
professionalCourses.description: This course covered the use of Python along with pandas, numpy, matplotlib, seaborn, scikit-learn, Oracle Accelerated Data Science Library (ADSL), and Oracle Analytics Cloud (OAC).
